entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CoreCLR test infra: get rid of spurious warning "Resolved file has a bad image, no metadata, or is otherwise inaccessible" #91564
    9.0.0
  • CoreCLR test infra: improve "Skip" messages for tests blocked in issues.targets #91562
    9.0.0
  • CoreCLR test infra: why does managed test build job build native library components? #91561
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Unnecessary browser and node calls breaking usage in restricted environments #91558
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CancellationTokenTests.DerivedCancellationTokenSource` fails #91552
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskContinueWhenAnyTests.RunContinueWhenAnyTests` fails #91550
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskPropertiesTests.TaskOptionsTestAsync` fails #91549
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskContinueWhenAllTests` fails #91548
  • [MT][browser] `Sytem.Threading` no exception throws #91547
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Timer` timeout #91545
  • System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.UnProtect error occurring after windows update following previous successful Protect #91544
  • TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose tests fail on Fedora 38 #91543
  • [MT][browser] `System.Transactions`, `System.Threading` timeouts #91541
  • Is there a way to hot reload a particular .wasm module after the runtime already initialised? #91539
  • [MT][browser] `System.Transactions`, `System.Threading` error: Thread failed to start #91538
  • [iOS][tvOS] Building tests fails with "Trimming assemblies requires .NET Core 3.0 or higher" #91535
  • Consider adding an `AggregateBy` method to LINQ #91533
    Future
  • Some System.Reflection.Emit implementations of `Type.IsByRefLike` still throw `NotSupportedException`: "Derived classes must provide an implementation" #91532
  • `volatile.` prefix doesn't work on `ldobj` or `stobj` #91530
  • Unexpected crash in Browser WASM (Possible Stack Corruption) #91528
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ValueTask<TResult, KToken> and IValueTaskSource<out TResult, KToken> #91527

Closed

  • QUIC Listener ConnectionOptionsCallback ALPN Narrowing Down Failure with Wrong Error Code #86701
    9.0.0
  • Update config binding gen nupkg transitive build target to use granular interceptor opt-in #91419
    8.0.0
  • Cross compiling for linux-arm64 produces 32-bit DLL files #91551
  • What do we need to get iterator implementation in `IDictionary`? #91540
  • What changed in .NET 6 that would affect JsonElement Equals behavior? #62585
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add cartesian product/cross join methods to System.Linq #79944
    Future
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.1.23415.7] videoduplicatefinder fail to import Scan Result with System.InvalidOperationException #91048
  • What do we need to get iterator implementation in `IDictionary`? #91529
  • [browser] [wasm] Remove StringContent special case #91379
    9.0.0
  • File does not contain a valid CIL image #91525

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable output compilation validation in binder gen unit tests #91565
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup native build warnings and unnecessary logos #91563
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/8.0] Enable interceptors implicitly in binder gen nupkg when generator is enabled #91559
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix Interlocked.Or/And for arm64 #91557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Use minipal/random.c for random number generation in the runtime. #91556
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasi] Fix pinvoke support. #91555
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Delete unused methods from CoreCLR PAL #91554
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • ARM64: Use stlur for volatile stores #91553
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Do not trim XUnitWrapperGenerator #91542
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • GC CI test #91537
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #91536
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix handling ThreadAbortException at the end of catch for LoongArch64. #91531
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

Merged

  • Unsigned check of index inside ElementAt #91522
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Activate Quic Alpn Narrowing Test #91116
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Enable interceptors implicitly in binder gen nupkg when generator is enabled #91469
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] remove special StringContent handling #91463
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Implement ThisPtrRetBufPrecode::Init #91451
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • Fix NativeAOT unhandled exception stack trace #91415
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix usage of load library #91490
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Switch the `AppWithSubDirs` project used for single-file tests to project that is built outside of test runs #91477
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy to ListDictionaryInternal #91355
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [c11] define mono atomics in terms of standard atomics #91489
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add FreeBSD case to gcenv. #91524
    os-freebsd, area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove a little work from CreateManifestAndDescriptors #90435
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Implement Linq CountBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #91507
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reenable C4244 MSVC warning and fix occurrences #91395
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] ELT Profiler Bring-Up #91313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Making installer tests pass on OSX-arm64 in Release build #91519
    area-Host
  • Fix Dispose and SendData Race on Http3 Test #91291
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • Expand CreateSpan in T0 #91403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Remove browser wasm from perf_slow #91429
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Upgrade wasm helix VMs to ubuntu 22.04 #90881
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • DNMD in Mono #91487
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V, LoongArch64] Fix assert(!regArgMaskLive) in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs #91414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet restore fails when .dcproj is part of solution #35134
  • project.assets.json doesn't have a target for 'net6.0-windows8.0/win-x64' when running dotnet publish with --no-build --no-restore #35131
  • [NETE2ESDK] With .NET 8 RC2 SDK pkg/deb/rpm installed, "An issue was encountered verifying workloads. For more information, run "dotnet workload update"." displayed when running the first dotnet command. #35128

Closed

  • Publishing Native AOT in Release mode still producing .pdb files #34959

PullRequests

Created

  • Container Build: Handle multiple tags wtihin one image #35138
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 21.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #35130
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 21.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #35129
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • Update branding to 7.0.402 #35074
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.112 #35072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.415 #35071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.318 #35070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.123 #35069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture … #35084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Razor with renamed compiler DLLs #34928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2259288 #34992
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Verify.Xunit to 20.8.0 #34925
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2259279 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Feature Request: Type Aliases for primitive arrays #1460
  • Proposal: Generic Equality Constraints #1706

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# Interactive should default to .NET (Core) #69813
  • Right-hand closing brackets (`>`) are not properly colored in nested generics #69811
  • ExportCodeFixProvider should be marked as Inherited = false #69809
    17.8 P4

Closed

  • "Convert to interpolated string" code fix doesn't remove `ToString` #69721
  • Interpolated string handler API support #69796
  • IDE0251 error in error list has no title #67949
    17.8 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Test #69814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bail out from remove unused member analyzer for ??= operator #69812
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Mark export attributes as Inherited = false #69810
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Trim ToString calls when converting to interpolated strings when there are interpolated string handlers available. #69723
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update TFM in tests to net8.0 #69669
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove well known implicit conversion method #69787
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Generate correct state mapping for methods containing await foreach #69806
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update "Current Document" background analysis semantics and fix Full Solution analysis with project config changes #69750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add analysis and emit difference time spans to EnC telemetry #69794
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Aspnetcore server check websocket connection status wrong. #50515
  • [Blazor] Add support for onclose event for dialog #50513
  • [Blazor] Please improve message on markup errors #50512
  • Add support for streaming text IAsyncEnumerable<string> results #50501

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #50500
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook uses soon-to-be-obsolete Facebook Graph version v11 in .NET 6 #50366
  • Blazor - Issue with SectionContent components when using @attribute [RenderModeServer(prerender:false)] #50139
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #50491
  • JSON Change #50088

PullRequests

Created

  • Create Babyphiah #50514
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Update selenium versions #50511
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2259687 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor
  • Update CertificateLoader.cs #50474
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App crashes when setting the `Style` property using the VisualStateManager within an implicit Style resource #17201
  • Problem with template #17198
  • An error for which there is no help: DeploymentManagerAutoInitializer.LogIfFailed #17197
  • Grid Layout Child Elements Not Taking Full Width of the Screen #17194
  • Binding a Color from a model is broken on Windows #17192

Closed

  • [cr_AutofillHintsService] java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to get length of null array #16994
  • Issue with Code Execution on iOS When Minimizing the Application #16954
  • Window title bar is not accessible when the Windows platform targeted .NET MAUI App is run as an Unpackaged type #14518
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ListView Visibility Problem in .Net 8.0 #17195
  • MAUI Entry Control Font Stability #16743
  • Unable to publish WPF Blazor app if I have a razor class with code behind and override OnInitialize and choose self contained #9491
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Private EventHandlers throw an exception on XAML-defined custom control, inherited by other control #11467
    .NET 8 GA
  • Unable to hide title bar fron window with blazor hybrid on Windows #17181
  • Maui ~ MediaElement: audio file playback does not reset to beginning after playing back once in Anddroid emulator but works correctly in Windows app #17153
  • Concise XAML by remove ending tag name #17180
  • HTTP files do not appear to work in MAUI #17183

PullRequests

Created

  • Grid rows ios fix #17199
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net7.0] Improve VisualElement API Docs Follow-up #17166
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net8.0] [release/8.0.1xx-rc1]Revert net7 sr8 #17174
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Updated the RoundRectangle BorderTest to check all 4 corners #17172
    area/testing
  • [xaml] locate event handlers from base types #17075
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1]Revert net7 sr8 #17173
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17177
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed window not reacting to TitleBar wnd message #17041
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Only return path to font file if it exists, otherwise copy it again. Fixes #16923 #16924
    area/fonts 🅰️, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Add ViewHandler & IViewHandler docs #17167
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TPH + HasTrigger: Potential undocumented breaking change in EFC8 #31627
  • ModelBuilder.Entity does not return generic instance. #31626
  • `.First()` on SqlQuery results in exception #31623
  • GroupBy with resultSelector neutralizes Include #31622
  • Constructor injection for complex types #31621

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.1 to 8.2.2 #31628
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Allow primitive collection mappings to be returned directly from provider #31619

  • Update branding to 7.0.309 #17287
  • Update branding to 7.0.112 #17286
  • Update branding to 6.0.415 #17285
